name: Zillionz of Zombiez
description:
Fight against an endless horde of zombies using an arsenal of weaponry. How long can you last?

Created in 1 month for Game Off 2022!

Features:

  • A fully destructible environment, both by you and the zombies
  • 15 unique weapons
  • 4 types of delicious food
  • Lots of gibs

CONTROLS:

  • Move: WASD
  • Shoot: Mouse
  • Interact: F
  • Pause: Escape

Source Code:

Zillionz of Zombiez source code on GitHub
